Message: Hi Kian! I’m awake now! Let’s have some fun together!
Hello Kian! Your friend is ready to play!
Good morning, Kian! Time to wake up and start a happy day!
Rise and shine, Kian! Let’s get ready for a fun morning!
Good morning, Kian… are you awake?
Good evening, Kian! How was your fun day?
Hi Kian! It’s evening time. Let’s listen or play!
Good night, Kian. Let’s get cozy and listen quietly.
Hi Kian… it’s bedtime. I’m right here with you.
Yay, Kian! A new story is here! Are you ready to listen?
Ooo! Kian put in a story card! Let’s begin!
Hi Kian! The radio is on! Let’s listen together.
Music time, Kian! Are you listening?
Hi Kian! You can talk to me now!
I’m listening, Kian. What do you want to say?
